about_the_game:
Making and sharing harmonica music has never been easier.

Notera is a program created for beginners and experienced players alike!
It allows for both composing and step by step instructions for playing your songs through a virtual harmonica and a comprehensive interface.

Notera contains the following features:

  • Easily create and share music score-pieces.
  • Plays in all 7 diatonic keys of the harmonica.
  • Automaticly creates a backup file of unsaved work.
  • Allows for custom fade in, sustain, fade out and volume of notes.
  • Has a help menu and extra commands for better optimization.
  • Exports and imports INI files for easy storage.


If you have ever wanted to learn the harmonica or compose with ease, this program is for you!

name: Notera

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA NVS 3100M
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 76 MB available space

short_description: Notera is created for anyone trying to learn or play the harmonica better. It allows for both composing and step by step instructions for playing your songs through a virtual harmonica and a comprehensive interface!
